DOC.brief_summary: Implantation failure remain one major factor limit success IVF treatment . It postulate local injury endometrium induces secretion cytokine growth factor leukemia inhibitory factor , interleukin-11 , heparin-binding EGF-like growth factor enhance decidualisation facilitate implantation . It may also up-regulate gene expression relate endometrial receptivity optimize endometrial development . In stimulated cycle , local injury proliferative endometrium postulate delay endometrial development thereby induce synchronicity endometrium embryo stage facilitate implantation ( Zhou et al , 2008 ; Almog et al , 2010 ; Gnainsky et al , 2010 ) The aim study determine whether endometrial injury endometrial biopsy mid-secretory phase precede cycle would improve on-going pregnancy rate subfertile woman undergo IVF treatment .
DOC.brief_title: RCT Effect Endometrial Injury Ongoing Pregnancy Rate Subfertile Women Undergoing IVF
DOC.detailed_description: Consecutive woman attend subfertility clinic Queen Mary Hospital , University Hong Kong schedule IVF treatment recruit . Women normal uterine cavity randomize study control group 1 1 ratio accord computer-generated randomization list . Patients stratify accord first repeat cycle . For patient study group , cycle immediately precede schedule IVF treatment , LH surge determine daily serum LH level start 18 day next expected period . LH surge define elevation LH 2 time level average previous 3 day absolute level LH equal 20 IU/L . Women randomize study group endometrial biopsy perform pipelle 7 day LH surge ( LH+7 ) instruct use non-hormonal mean contraception cycle . All patient proceed IVF treatment next cycle schedule . They receive standard ovarian stimulation accord departmental protocol maximum two embryo replace 2 day oocyte retrieval . On-going pregnancy rate two group compare .
DOC.criteria: Undergoing IVF tubal , unexplained male factor subfertility Normal uterine cavity show saline sonogram / hysteroscopy do baseline Presence hydrosalpinx Presence endometrial polyp fibroid distort uterine cavity IVF cycle carry preimplantation genetic diagnosis Use donor gamete
